document_data.mainbody:
areeansis was a balor who taught Jesanta Beril about demonbinding in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
While disguised as an old man, Fareeansis kept a sharp, red glint to his eyes.
At some point, Fareeansis was summoned and bound in the Prime Material plane. In the mid-to-late 14 century DR, Fareeansis met Jesanta Beril while disguised as a sage named Benedict. He taught her enough of Nar demonbinder lore, but not enough for her to bind him.
